metaTitle: FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT Finestrat | 2 Bed Apartments from €400,000
metaDescription: Discover FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT in Finestrat, Alicante. Modern 2-bedroom apartments from €400,000 by NPE. Completion 2026. Prime Costa Blanca location.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT, an exceptional residential development by NPE located in the prestigious Campana Garden area of Finestrat, Alicante. This thoughtfully designed project offers 2-bedroom apartments starting from €400,000, representing outstanding value in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after destinations. With completion scheduled for December 1st, 2026, FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT combines modern architectural excellence with proximity to pristine beaches, world-class golf courses, and comprehensive amenities that appeal to discerning buyers seeking both lifestyle and investment potential. The development features spacious 80m² units built to the highest standards, offering the perfect balance of comfort, quality, and affordability. Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean retreat, a rental investment property, or a permanent residence in Spain's most vibrant region, FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT by NPE delivers contemporary living with authentic Costa Blanca charm. The established international community in Finestrat welcomes English-speaking residents, making this an ideal choice for overseas buyers looking for a seamless transition to Spanish coastal living.

locationSection.intro: Nestled in the heart of Campana Garden, FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT benefits from one of the Costa Blanca's most coveted locations. Finestrat represents the perfect synthesis of Mediterranean lifestyle and modern convenience, attracting a diverse international community while maintaining authentic Spanish character. The area is celebrated for its stunning natural landscape, with dramatic cliffs overlooking pristine beaches and a thriving expat community where English is widely spoken. Campana Garden offers exceptional proximity to major amenities including world-renowned golf courses, multiple Blue Flag beaches, and excellent healthcare facilities. The region's popularity stems from its perfect position between the vibrant resort atmosphere and peaceful residential tranquility. Strategic location advantages include rapid access to Alicante Airport, well-established shopping facilities, and an abundance of dining and entertainment options. FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT positions you at the heart of all this activity while maintaining the peaceful, exclusive environment that makes Costa Blanca living so desirable.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, Private clinics with English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum, and local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining scene with international and Spanish cuisine

propertyFeatures.intro: FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT by NPE exemplifies contemporary Spanish construction at its finest. Each apartment is meticulously built to exacting standards using premium materials and sustainable building practices. The development showcases modern architectural design that complements the natural beauty of Finestrat while delivering the comfort and efficiency expected by discerning international buyers. Every 80m² unit benefits from careful space planning, superior thermal insulation, and quality finishes throughout. The construction incorporates latest building regulations and energy efficiency standards, ensuring long-term value and low running costs. Attention to detail extends from structural engineering to interior specifications, with NPE's reputation for excellence evident in every aspect of the development.
features: Communal swimming pool with landscaped gardens
Double glazing with thermal break system

content.investmentSection: FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT represents a compelling investment opportunity in a market demonstrating strong fundamentals. The Costa Blanca property market shows consistent growth of +8% year-on-year, with Finestrat positioned as one of the region's prime appreciation zones. At approximately €5,000 per m² for new build apartments, FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT offers exceptional value—approximately 40% less than comparable properties on Spanish islands. The rental market remains robust, with similar properties commanding €800 per week in high season, generating attractive returns for investment-focused buyers. The established international community ensures steady demand from both owner-occupiers and renters seeking quality Costa Blanca properties. Finestrat's continued infrastructure development, including improved transport links and expanding amenities, supports long-term value appreciation. For investors seeking diversification, rental income, or capital appreciation, FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT by NPE provides a secure foundation backed by a trusted developer with proven track record in the region.
whyBuySection: Strategic location in prestigious Campana Garden, Finestrat
Trusted developer NPE with established reputation for quality
Exceptional value: 40% less than Spanish island markets
Strong rental potential: €800 per week in high season

Several championship golf courses nearby for enthusiasts

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT?
faqs.answer: From €400,000. FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT offers 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartments with built size of 80m². This pricing represents exceptional value on the Costa Blanca. Contact our team for current availability and payment plans.

faqs.question: When will FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT be completed?
faqs.answer: Completion is scheduled for December 1st, 2026. NPE provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Early investors benefit from competitive pricing and flexible payment schedules during construction. Contact us for detailed delivery schedules and payment options.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT?
faqs.answer: NPE is the developer, renowned for delivering quality residential projects throughout Finestrat and the surrounding Costa Blanca region. Their reputation for excellence, attention to detail, and customer satisfaction makes them a trusted choice for new build properties in Alicante.

faqs.question: Is Finestrat a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Finestrat offers an established international community where English is commonly spoken, making it ideal for overseas buyers. The area shows consistent property value growth of +8% year-on-year, excellent amenities including a regional hospital within 30 minutes, and multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes. The combination of lifestyle, investment potential, and infrastructure makes Finestrat an outstanding choice for property purchase.

faqs.question: How far is FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes of FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT, providing easy access to pristine Mediterranean coastline. The nearby beaches offer excellent swimming, water sports, and beach club facilities, combining relaxation with vibrant coastal atmosphere.

faqs.question: What amenities are near FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT?
faqs.answer: Comprehensive amenities surround the development: Shopping includes Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets; Healthcare features a regional hospital within 30 minutes and private clinics with English-speaking doctors; Golf enthusiasts enjoy several championship courses nearby; Beaches offer multiple Blue Flag options within 20 minutes; Transport includes bus connections with car recommended for flexibility.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain including FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT without restrictions. No visa is required specifically for property purchase. We recommend consulting with a Spanish lawyer and fiscal advisor regarding NIE (tax identification) requirements and any applicable regulations. Our team can guide you through the entire purchase process.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property at FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT?
faqs.answer: Purchase costs typically include: property price (from €400,000), transfer tax (approximately 6-8%), notary fees, registration fees, and legal costs (1-2%). Spanish property taxes include annual IBI (property tax) and potential rental income tax if let. We recommend obtaining a detailed cost breakdown from your legal advisor.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential of FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT?
faqs.answer: Properties in Finestrat generate strong rental income, with 7-night rentals commanding approximately €800 in peak season. The established tourism infrastructure, proximity to beaches, and international appeal create consistent rental demand. Many owners achieve 5-7% annual returns through short-term vacation rentals or long-term leasing.

content.conclusion: FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT by NPE represents your gateway to the Mediterranean lifestyle you've always envisioned. With prices from €400,000, completion in December 2026, and positioning in one of Costa Blanca's most desirable communities, this development offers unmatched value for buyers seeking quality, location, and investment potential. Whether you're planning a permanent move, a vacation retreat, or a savvy investment property, FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT delivers on every level. The combination of modern amenities, proximity to beaches and golf, established international community, and strong market fundamentals creates the perfect opportunity for discerning buyers. Don't miss this chance to secure your piece of paradise on the Costa Blanca. Contact our team today via WhatsApp to arrange a viewing, discuss payment options, or ask any questions. Let FINESTRAT PARADISE RESORT transform your Spanish property dreams into reality.
